channel.title: I Can´t Play On Windows 8
channel.description:
I downloaded and installed Black Mesa when my computer was Win7, but I've just updated to Win8 and now I can´t play.
1.- I open Black Mesa with steam (goes normally):freeman: 2.- Menu Opens (goes normally):freeman: 3.- Load Game (Goes normally until loading bar is full, then the screen freezes and I need to close hl2 process directly from Task admin) :fffuuu:
P.D. I can play non-steam games with source, such as whole Orange Box
Anyone knows what to do or maybe try so it's still working? Thanks!
